Built-in Templates
ammonite_head

ammonite_head

This template is special among other built-in templates. It is the only template that allows users to modify the contents within the head element.

Parameters

Name Type Description
title String Sets the title of the web page
description String Sets the description of the web page for Google Search, Twitter preview, etc.
thumbnail_url String Sets the thumbnail image of the web page for Google Search, Twitter preview, etc.

Example

```ammonite_head
	"version": 1,
	"data": {
		"title": "My web page title",
		"description": "This is my web page",
		"thumbnail_url": "https://ammonite.dev/assets/abc.png"
	}
}
```
